comment: Don't take this professor if you have a job. Too many assignments and uses a trash platform named ALEKS to teach students.

The strongest issue I have with her is the long list of (unreasonable) rules that she has for her exams. Let me preface this by saying that the exams are 50% of your grade overall and if you forget to complete one of her rules she will take up to 20 points off. Absolutely ridiculous! Please do not take her.

Professor Schafer adeptly employs diverse teaching methods, breaking down complex concepts with clear explanations and relatable examples. She guides students through detailed problem-solving strategies, encouraging critical thinking and offering multiple perspectives for better comprehension.

Horrific. This class had a ridiculous amount of homework that all took place on ALEKS which is a garbage platform. This class is more about memorization than learning. The test rules are super strict and you will get points off if you don't follow the format she wants. If you work a job and have many other classes I do not recommend this lady.

Literally the worst professor I have ever had!!! Gives hw on ALEKS and be prepared to be working for 5 hours a day!!! Very inconsiderate and super strict on tests. She counted off point for me using my notebook as scratch paper ! DO NOT TAKE HER !

I dont even know where to begin, Absolute horror of a class to take. Trust me when I say you wont get a B or higher if you're not studying and doing homework atleast 5 hours a day. No room for extra credit, No exceptions when you miss a test, even if you're sick or at the hospital. She wont care and will give you a Zero. Test are lockdown/Camera :(

Her test policy are way too strict, takes off point if your scratch paper is not formated how she wants, will mark right answers wrong if not solved how she wants. She is exactly what is wrong with the learning system, not actually learning but just memorize and forget. Really wish I had changed class when given the opportunity.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Does not care about teaching you anything. Inconsistent with her grading from student to student. Phones it it and talks down to you for asking for help. ALEKS should not be allowed in higher education period. Avoid her because she sucks

way way way too much homework daily. Math is one of my best subjects and yet I struggled in her class. The strict due dates for exams and homework and there are no exceptions when things happen. If you miss one test you have to provide 3 pieces of evidence on what happened and the final replaces that test, so you miss out on a chance to do a exam.

I took college algebra before taking this class. However, even as someone confident in math, I want to say this class is pretty heavy in terms of workload. Each week there is one due HW module (ranging from 6-18 topics). All homework, classwork, and tests are on ALEKS. Strict testing policies, and closed notes on all tests.
Very rude and non helpful. I asked for ways to improve and her response wasnt helpful at all. If you need Pre Cal as a credit, simply take another professor cause she isnt the best one

for being an online course, she does way too much in terms of requirements for homework and exams. If you struggle on the homework she helps but at the same time its through ALEKS which is the worst math platform i've seen in my life. Have fun doing 10-15 hours of work every week along with very strict testing procedures

Please do not take her class if you have a job. If you even want to begin to understand the homework, you have to work over 15 hours a week on it. She DOES NOT allow notes on texts and DOES NOT give practice tests. This led me to just guess what will be on the 20 question test out of the 70+ topics that I already learned. I failed the first test.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: Easy A overall, don't miss any Tests if you can help it. You only get 1 day to take tests. I worked a full-time job and took 7 classes, including this class. I was able to keep up with all the HWs and Tests, but I missed a test due to a situation I couldn't control, but she wasn't very understanding or helpfulno makeups/extra credit.

I took this class 100% online and everything is in on ALEKS (tests and hw). There are 4 tests for the semester (lockdown & webcam) and lots of hw. She doesnt have any videos to help with the content, but she does do zooms. The test are tough, but are similar to the homework assignments. She does have a ton of rules for the test though. Good luck.
